The pure class interface. 
public class State
  extends AnnotatedTerm
The abstract syntax of a statechart state.

Version: $Id: State.pizza,v 1.3 1998/09/06 15:24:31 wg Exp $

BasicState(NameDecl)
Basic state
RefState(NameDecl)
State reference.
SuperState(NameDecl, StateKind, State[], NameDecl[], Transition[])
Superstate.

StateKind
Super-state kind.

BasicState
public case BasicState(NameDecl name);
Basic state.

Parameters:
name - the name of the state.

RefState

public case RefState(NameDecl name);
State reference.

Parameters:
name - the name of the referred state.

SuperState

public case SuperState(NameDecl name,
                       StateKind kind,
                       State[] substates,
                       NameDecl[] connectors,
                       Transition[] transitions);
Superstate.

Parameters:
name - the name of the state
kind - what kind of superstate (xor or and)
substates - the substates of this superstate
connectors - declaration of connectors used in this superstate
transitions - the transitions of this superstate

public static class StateKind
public static class StateKind
  extends Term
Super-state kind.
